title: Leftists' Arrogance Will Be Their Downfall | Guest: Andy McCarthy | 11/9/21
description:
Glenn shares the story of a group of anti-cancel culture activists from across the political aisle who are attempting the impossible: creating an open-minded university set to instill values, not indoctrinate students. Pat Gray joins to discuss the sexualized assault accusation against CNN anchor Don Lemon. Andy McCarthy, contributing editor for National Review, joins to discuss the Steele dossier, Kyle Rittenhouse, and Biden's diary. Calls for the arrest of Rep. Paul Gosar are being heard after he posted an edited anime of himself attacking Rep. AOC. Glenn and Stu discuss the hypocrisy of the outrage. Glenn comes back to a question Stu asked regarding cryptocurrency and shows how history is repeating itself.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
